subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Dozens of spectators at Daytona International Speedway were injured Saturday when a racecar hit the fence that surrounds the track and debris flew into the stands.
snippet: Dozens of spectators at Daytona International Speedway were injured Saturday when a racecar hit the fence that surrounds the track and debris flew into the stands.
